SO if you are pregnant , do n't make the same mistake that I did and buy a whole load of these bottles thinking that they are the best .

27930.sentence: They leak like mad ... and although you tell yourself you must be doing something wrong because no bottle should leak this much , it 's not your fault . It 's these idiotic bottles ! I ca n't imagine how they passed any kind of testing when they were being made . Please do n't buy them , it is a huge waste of money !

27931.sentence: These bottles leak . It does n't matter how you assemble them , or if you assemble them wet , or dry , or in space , or in a cave . They leak . Terribly . And Avent knows it . They will even replace your leaky bottles if you call 1800 54avent . Of course the ones they replace it with also leak . Buy Dr. Browns instead .

27932.sentence: HI , I HAD THESE BOTTLES BACK IN 2002 WHEN MY SON WAS BORN BECAUSE THE HOSPITAL GAVE THEM TO US TO USE TO FEED THE BABY . I HAD NO PROBLEMS BUT WHEN I BOUGHT MORE WHEN I GOT HOME , I HAD NOTHING BUT LEAKY PROBLEMS ! ! ! I EMAILED AVENT 2 TIMES AND THEY TOLD ME FIRST THAT I HAVE TO CALL THEM TO `` TALK ABOUT IT '' I SAID FORGET IT AND THEN I COMPLAINED AGAIN WHEN THE LEAKING KEPT HAPPENING . THEY SAID THAT I WAS NOT PUTTING THE NIPPLE AND RING ON CORRECTLY . THEY TOLD ME TO ONLY TURN THE RING UNTIL U FEEL IT JUST ATTATCH TO THE BOTTLE AND DO NOT OVER TIGHTEN . I TRIED THIS AND YET AGAIN THE BABY WAS SOAKED ! ! ! MY POINT OF WRITING ABOUT THIS NOW IN 2005 WHEN I USED THESE BOTTLES IN 2002 IS THAT I CAN NOT BELEIVE THIS PROBLEM HAS NOT BEEN CORRECTED YET ! ! ! WE THINK WE HAVE ANOTHER BABY ON THE WAY AND I KNOW THAT WE WILL NOT , NOT , NOT , BE GETTING AVENT BOTTLES ! ! !

27933.sentence: Avent bottles have more BPA than any other leading brand . BPA free brands include Born Free , Nurture Pure , MAM , Green to Grow , Baby Life and Adrini . ( For those that missed the news reports - BPA is a chemical found in some plastics that a recent National Institutes of Health report indicated may be harmful , especially to infants . )

27934.sentence: These bottles are very finicky and if you do not put them together just right they will leak ... not drip ... POUR out all over the floor , and if it is breast milk that is gushing out of the bottle you may just be crying too ! I ended up with a full set of these bottles ( without the ring ) and one that required the ring ( which I felt leaked less ) , I could never justify going out and buy all new bottles , so I dealt with these for 11 months . I have now weaned my son off of these and onto a sippy cup because I just could not deal any longer ! What 's the trick ? Well , the nipple has these three little lines on it and inside the screw on part there are solid parts and slotted parts ( sorry if this does n't make sense ) . You have to line up the lines on the nipple with the solid parts on the bottle top . This requires two hands , so you will also need to find a place to put down your screaming baby while you concentrate and get it all lined up perfectly . Once you have them lined up , now screw on the top . You have to make sure it is nice and tight . Now , shake it and see ... . it leaks ! It is because when you screw the top onto the bottle the nipple shifts and turns as you screw it on tight , so all that time you spent lining up the holes with the slots is garbage . Take it off and try again . Finally you will get it right and only then can you give the bottle to your starving child.I can not wait to throw them all in the trash .

27935.sentence: I have tried five different types of bottles and these are horrible . Do n't waste your money . Dr. Brown 's is the way to go !

27936.sentence: Sent me 3 bottles one of which did n't have a lid in the box . Crappy quality control . Just buy them at the store for more money , at least you 'll get all the parts with it . 5 stars for avent , -5 stars for seller .

27937.sentence: I recieved boxes of these bottles as gifts , every one of them leaks . I tried everything to stop the leaks , but nothing worked . Avent makes a great manual breast pump , but they need to put a better bottle on the market .

27938.sentence: The nipple is so long that my infant was gagging everytime i tried to feed her . It is n't great for infants that are nursing ... My daughter had a fit when i tried to feed her . Not only was she gagging , but she just did n't like the nipple . I used the playtex nurser bottle and she loved it . I have been using those bottles and nipples ever since , and she is doing great when i need to switch from breast to bottle .

27939.sentence: I am extremely tired of having to clean up messes after feeding our twin sons with the Avent bottles . Especially if we are out for a big event and the boys are dressed nicely . The bottles worked great for the first six months and then ... ..THEY ALL LEAKED . It was not a small leak rather , a pouring leak that soaked their shirts . I hate these bottles and plan to switch ! ! !

27940.sentence: We used Avent bottles for several weeks , but our baby was spitting up _all the time_ , seemed like she was choking during feedings , and had gas all the time . We switched to the Playtex VentAire bottles when she was 6 weeks old , and problem solved ! No more crying from gas , she hardly ever spits up anymore , and she has a much easier time at feedings . The flow is slower and it really does cut down on the amount of air she takes in during feedings . So , I highly recommend trying something other than the Avent bottles for small infants . Maybe later , when our baby is a bit older we 'll pull out the Avent bottles again , but for now , we are n't using anything except Playtex VentAire .

27941.sentence: when i became pregnant i planned on using these bottles , i bought everything bottle warmer , sterilizer , breast pump , and a ton of bottles and nipples . well 2 weeks into using them i threw them out the window . my daughter had very bad gas . when i switched bottles the gas stopped . Plus the bottles are expensive ... ... you have to keep buying new nipples there are sooo many different sizes . a waste i think , most bottles have 2 fast or slow but there seemed to be 4 different sizes or more .

27942.sentence: These bottles were terrible for us . They leaked no matter how many times I tried and followed the directions . They also did not keep my daughter from being gassy . As soon as we changed her bottles to the Dr. Browns she slept through the night with no wake ups . I was not a big fan of these bottles and neither was my daughter .

27943.sentence: My daughter liked the nipple but got to much air . I tried these and the Dr. Brown but ended up going back to Playtex Nursers ( I used these with all my other kids ) I wouldnt recommend these .

27944.sentence: These bottles just did n't work for my baby . We tried and tried for 3 and 1/2 months to get my baby to take these bottles but it just did n't work . My baby is mostly breastfed , and is only given a bottle occasionally , so I did n't give up on these bottles right away , just thinking that he was n't used to the bottles and that 's why he was having a tough time . My mom babysat and she has raised nine kids , all who were bottlefed , so she is an expert . She said to me that the baby just really ca n't use this nipple . He chews on it and could n't suck properly , the nipple seemed to hard for him . He could n't latch on right and all the milk would spill out the sides of his mouth . Well , I take anything she says seriously ! After investing alot of time and money in Avent , I decided to scrap them and start over . I went out and found a nipple that was closest to his pacifier that he loves . I found Gerber Nuk nipples , got four of them for about $ 4 and bought Especially for Baby bottles for a whopping $ 2.99 ( you get 3 ) and my baby LOVES them ! ! ! ! THe bottles are cute ( the gerber bottles would be fine , too , but they were n't cute enough ! ) He takes the nipple right away and finally the bottles are emptied in no time . What a relief . I am sure Avent is good for some babies , but not mine , even after months of `` training '' . My advice is to try different bottles before settling on one kind . One more note , I read the other reviews that talk about leaking , I did n't have this problem at all . The only leaking was from my son 's mouth when he could n't latch on properly . But my cousin used Avent and they leaked terribly for her and she switched to Dr Browns . I would have tried Dr Browns but it looks like their bottles have the same nipples as Avent , too hard and not good for my baby . Expensive is n't always better !

27945.sentence: When breastfeeding , these are highly recomended . The problem with a breastfeeding mom is , they do not fit standard US breast pumps . So basicly you have to pump into one bottle , then transfer into this one ( this causes a problem for those of us who do n't produce quite enough milk -- - every drop that is lost in transfer is crutial ) . Then you are faced with the leaking problem . The directions say to wet the rim to prevent leaking . Well , sometimes that works and sometimes it dose n't . Again , I am reminded of how delicate every drop of milk was . Sometimes these bottles will taunt you . I would test the bottle before giving it to baby ... then after I was convinced it would n't leak ... baby would begin to suck and would instantly be drownded ! And there you are , wasted milk , and a hungry baby who is drenched , and really mad by the time you get another bottle ready and her clothes changed ! ! ! The day I stopped breast feeding I switched to playtex vent aire , which only leak once in a blue moon , if you dont put it together right .

27946.sentence: I choose these bottles because they are very popular but then realized that the size of them are so large that the baby never really seems to be able to get a good hold on them . I started bottle feeding at 6 months and ended up having to switch and buy an entire new line . After my son turned 1 began to wean him off the bottle and introduced the avent bottles again just to see if he could hold it and it was still way to large for him ... .. I guess these bottles would work if you plan on bottle feeding a toddler with big hands

27947.sentence: My baby never wanted to take them , or when he did , he looked like he was going to choke ( even with the newborn nipples ! ) , and was doing a mess , with milk dripping everywhere . The Evenflo nipples were cheaper and better .

27948.sentence: When my daughter was born we stocked up on these bottles because we heard they were good and the price alone would make you think that . Well after using them for about 2 weeks they started to leak . NOT fun at 3:00 in the morning when you shake up a bottle and there is milk fling around.Even worse is when you are feeding and the milk pours out on baby 's face . Not only do you have to clean up but your baby does n't want to wait for a new bottle . After slowly running out of bottles that did n't leak we decided to go with the Playtex Nursers and liners.These work perfect ! They do n't leak and our baby has less gas . The liners prevent a lot of gas . If you are worried about the cost of liners Target has their own brand that is about half the price . You get 100 of them for maybe $ 5.00 . We have n't had any problems with leaking at all.So I do n't recommend the Avent bottles unless you want to be cleaning up milk all the time . But the other Avent things we have like the sterilizer , warmer , & many other products work just perfectly and would recommend all of them ! So if you want to give these bottles a try because they do get some great reviews then just buy a few at first.We had no luck with the avent bottles but that does n't mean they are all bad . I just had to give a warning so you do n't lose a lot of money like we did .

27949.sentence: these dont require that extra ring to make it leak proof . i had the originals and they work great too but i like the big capacity but not big size of these . they will leak out of the nipple if it is upside down so if your baby feeds themselves , watch that they dont drop it and wedge it somewhere upside downupdated review***** i love avent NATURALLY bottles and trusted that is what i was getting when i looked at all 12 customer photos . well i broke these babies out to use em last night and they are reg avent bottles with the stupid ring on the inside that makes it not leak ( something not needed in the other bottle ) the plastic used is also completely different . it isnt the hard clear plastic that doesnt cloud or stain , it is the dull non see through plastic that feels pliable . and the oz numbering on these reg bottles is the kind that will scratch and rub off easily . so disappointed that i now have to return these : (

27950.sentence: We got these bottles because they are supposed to be the closest thing to breast feeding , and they advertise a 'slow-flow ' nipple . Needless to say , the milk just ran down our baby 's chin every time . The slow-flow is not slow enough for a baby who is accustomed to breast feeding and having to work at gettimg milk out . They are way too expensive and did n't work well for us .

27951.sentence: Baby is breast-fed and I registered for these so I could pump and my husband could feed her at night . Our baby hated the bottle and would n't take the nipple . The nipples , on the Avent , are too long and hard and would make her gag when she attempted to latch on . We switched to the Platex NaturalLatch and now she takes a bottle . The nipples on the Platex are much softer and shorter . Baby switches between the bottle and breast now , no problem .

27952.sentence: I found the nipple to be way too hard for my newborn son to suck . I then ran out and got the Munchkin Tri-flow . You can change how fast the milk flows out of the bottle as you baby grows and the nipple is much softer ! Munchkin also sells just the nipple that is compatable with the Avent bottle . So , if you 've already purchased the avent bottles your money has not gone to waste ! The only problem is that the Tri-flow is still fairly new and is very hard to find ! Good Luck !

27953.sentence: I bought this to use with my Avent bottles ( which by the way LEAK ) and I was very disappointed . My doctor told me to pump to stimulate my milk production which was coming in slowly . I could not get very much with this and needless to say it was not helping . Once I started using a Medela Electric pump , I got tons of milk ! I was skeptical about the price , but it 's totally worth it if you want to be able to use a pump on a regular basis .

27954.sentence: I based my decision to purchase this pump based on all the reviews it got . However , it takes me about 20 minutes to pump 4 ounces.. on a good day ! ! Luckily , I have an awesome boss , who allows me all the time I need to pump.. I average 2-3 ounces every hour and half.. at 20 minutes at a time.. which is rediculous . If I could , I would purchase an electric pump , because as my baby grows , I do n't see how I 'd be able to catch up to her growing appetite using this pump , and not spend my whole day in the bathroom pumping . On the plus side.. all the litle extras it came with are great , and the case is discreet and keeps the bottles cold for a few hours .

27955.sentence: I had NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO idea.. ! ! ! I only recieved this pump - no electrical one and I wanted 2 diiiiie ! I was in pain for days after I gave birth , irritable because of the lost of sleep and trying to conform to the babies temporary sleeping pattern . I had a low milk supply and breastpumping for 1 hour for only 4ounces - this was not a joke ! I wanted 2 diiiie I tell you.. I would finish pumping and da baby would be getting up for a feeding ... NOooooo ! already , I would think ... yes and with only 4 oz to show . Here I go with the stupid MANUEL pump ... NO.. I NOW know better ... . electronic and a good brand- so what you pay 300. and change its worth your sanity , sleep , time , energy and appreciation for the bond with the baby . My milk supply in time grew ( not soon enough ) I am still nursing and again the manuel pump and I did NOT have a good relationship . We started off badly

27956.sentence: I love the Advent line & highly recommend their bottles & microwave sterilizer , but this breast pump is awful ! The prong that connects to the handle , which creates the vacuum to pull the milk out , consistently becomes unlatched breaking the vacuum so you have to fix it and start all over . The only reason it got a two stars rating was because the pump handle does fit extremely well on the bottles and everything fits in the bag nicely .

27957.sentence: If you are only going to be pumping once in a blue moon , then this is a great pump for you . I found it to be an incredible nusance , so I borrowed a friend 's Medela electric pump . Never used this Back to Work pump more than twice after using hers ! Why spend a longer amount of time pumping that you have to ( and yes it does take longer even though the manual says their stats say otherwise ) . With our next child , I will definitely be buying electric !

27958.sentence: The instructions that came with this are terrible . The diagrams are really tiny and have no labels . The written instructions for Step 1 say `` see the diagram '' and do not elaborate , making the instructions worthless . The 3M sticky tape is REALLY sticky . Do not expect to get it off your furniture or to reuse these edge guards - the tape will cling to your furniture and to the guards , destroying both.In the end I was unable to install my guards properly - they attached to the furniture crookedly and then I could n't un-stick them in order to make it right . The guards are nice , thick foam , but that does n't matter if the installation goes miserably.You can see my photos of the final results I got in the Customer Image Gallery .

27959.sentence: The title says it all ... the edges of the bumpers were very tempting for my daughter to peel every chance she got . You 'd think her ability to remove the ends of the bumpers would indicate the bumpers would be easy to remove.They were a nightmare and have ruined our beautiful coffee table . I 've tried goo gone to no avail . If anyone has any tips how to get the tape off , which is coated with random pieces of foam from the old bumpers , I 'd love to hear them . I ca n't believe how awful my table looks .

27960.sentence: We put this on our coffee table six months ago , all but one of the corners have fallen off repeatedly . The long strips dont really protect my child much . She will still bump into the table at times and it doesnt offer much cushion . It is not really thick enough or wide enough . Corners are a joke . The tape provided is not sticky enough . Just keeps coming off .

27961.sentence: I do n't understand why they would make a product that does not fit standard corner tables ! I need to return this item

27962.sentence: Good idea but this is very cheaply made ... it is not sticky enough to stay on anything ... my 6 month old baby would just yank it off immediately . I wish I never purchased this because you 'd basically have to crazy glue to your furniture and there 's no way I am doing that !

27963.sentence: You know when you 're child free and buy great furniture ? You ca n't fathom the day when you 'll have to apply foam to your beautiful wood table so your child does n't go head first into the sharp corner ? Those days are now a distant memory and you bite the bullet and apply a foam guard . Then you go to take it off because your child has spilled parmesan cheese and ... what ... the ? The wood came off . The WOOD came off . I expected to have to use some Goo-Be-Gone to get off the adhesive but this actually destroyed the table . Not like a dent that could be sanded . I piece of wood literally splintered off . So , while this product will protect your kid 's noggin , do n't put it on a piece of furniture you like .

27964.sentence: This product does not adhere well . I have tried it on wood , metal , and painted surfaces . What 's more , other `` safety '' products I have purchased that use well-known 3M tape were defective as well . Also , when I tried to remove the cushion , the tape removed my furniture paint . Overall , I rate this item with 2 stars because the neutral color does not attract my toddler 's attention and the cushion does prevent painful head bumps .

27965.sentence: When you first put this on the table you feel like it has made things safer for your child , however the first time they get near it they are able to pull it off because the adhesive provided with it does n't hold well unless you have a completely flat surface to attach it to . ( I suppose if you use a stronger adhesive you would run the risk of damaging the table ) .Only buy if you have a large top face and edge to the table with no decorative surface changes ( must be completely flat to hold at all )

27966.sentence: This is the worst thing ever . It sticks for one week and then its down . I put in on my coffe table and end tables and they are all damage because of the tape.Do n't buy it

27967.sentence: I love how soft and cuddly this changing pad cover is . I also appreciate how many colors it comes in.What I am disappointed with is the durability . I have 3 of these and have used them for just over a year . They are totally falling apart at the elastic . Now , keep in mind that we use disposable `` chucks '' ( those blue hospital disposable under pads ) on top of this terry cloth changing pad . It makes it less messy ( especially early on ) and does n't require washing as much . I also washed them in cold water with Baby Dreft detergent , hung them to dry and rotated the 3 covers that we have.While it is a nice product while it lasts , I just expected them to be more durable .

27968.sentence: After only a few uses and washes , this pad cover started to tear . It was ripping in the corners , and no matter how gentle I was , the hole got bigger.The color choice is out standing . . .however I just wish that it had held up a bit better for us .

27969.sentence: Great colors , and I like Simmons ' contoured changing pad , which this is supposed to fit , but keep in mind that washing will significantly shrink the covers & amp ; the terry fabric does n't hold up well . After just a couple of months , ours are already coming apart .

27970.sentence: Washed it once according to directions & it shrunk beyond belief ! Did n't even use it once ! Do n't bother ! ! !

27971.sentence: do not waste your moneyi got it and i tried with 2 strollers the same exact one but it would not work goodyou can not move that much and its hard to make a turn ... ...

27972.sentence: These do n't stick at all ! My guys ripped them off the sides of the tables the second we put them up . The adhesive would n't restick either . What a waste . : (

27973.sentence: They do n't seem to stick very well . Also , once they did start to come off , I noticed it was leaving that sticky residue behind on my coffee table .

27974.sentence: it never worked , i cleaned the surface and followed direction ... failed.tried with double sided tape ... failed.tried with regular tape ... . failed.i think the problem is that it 's not smooth again the surface on top , so it creates a little gap and easily falls off .

27975.sentence: This item is not top quality . I do n't have too many of this company 's other products , so if this is an example of their quality than I do n't think I will . First off the cover does not open without popping off the hinge and needing to be reattached , the batteries only lasted through two cd 's , the volume does n't get very high , and it does n't even fit on the side of our crib . Being in the baby business they should know that not all crib 's are made the same . You are much better off just getting a simple boom box that play 's cd 's .

27976.sentence: could not even try it it did n't fit on our crib . looks like a good idea .

27977.sentence: What a disappointment ! We were so grateful to receive this at a baby shower- it was something we really wanted . However , it did not live up to expectations . The sound quality was awful- very , very quiet even on the highest volume setting and , even worse , extreme static . I exchanged it for another one thinking that maybe the first was defective but had the same problems . For such an expensive item the quality is very poor.We ended up ordering the Fisher Price Tape Player online and it is really wonderful . We love it- buy it instead , better quality and cheaper !

27978.sentence: I thought this would be a great idea . So when we found out we were having twins i ran out and bought 2 of them . We started to put the nurserys together and when it came time to put these on they wouldnt fit . I didnt want to stratch the crib rails up so we took them back . When we did try to play a cd in them it skipped . We ended up just buying small cd/radio players for each of their room because this is something they can both use for a long time .

27979.sentence: While I think it 's a great fit for the toilet , my daughter wo n't sit on it for more than a couple minutes , having to adjust every few seconds because she says it & # 34 ; is n't comfy & # 34 ; . After the great reviews and was actually recommended to me by my sister , it just does n't work for our daughter . I 'm going to have to buy a cheap padded one I guess . Stinks that I ca n't return this thing . Pretty expensive .

27980.sentence: Works well , but you basically need to also buy the steps that go with it or your kid can not get on the potty by themselves.. which is the point . To be honest we have the mini potty by baby bjorn and it is simpler and the kids can do it all on their own ... so this might be good for someone to use in a second bathroom where they do not want to have a little potty sitting around . You can easily hide it behind the toilet ...

27981.sentence: Bought two based on a lot of the good reviews , one for our upstairs and downstairs bathrooms . The splash guard can hurt your son . Also the splash guard does n't work to keep the pee from shooting out from under the seat . If you have a girl it might be for you , if you have a boy do n't get this seat . Make sure you read the other reviews about boys and this potty seat . Also the seat is bulky and very annoying to get it to fit each time . This potty seat has discourage our son from wanting to use the potty . If anyone who has had a hard time potty training their kids this will make it so much harder ! !

27982.sentence: I didnt know you had to lift the seat up to use this . there is a rubber thing inthe back that stops you from placing it on the seat itself , you need to lift up the seat and place it on the dirty part of the rim ... .all b/c of that stupid rubber thing in the back . I evem tried cutting it off , but it still doesnt help . this was a poor design .

27983.sentence: Love the company but this trainer does not fit a round toilet and seat . ( We have a Toto with a Bemis seat . ) This is not entirely clear in the product description , so I hope this review helps others avoid the hassle of ordering and returning .

27984.sentence: We have a standard size and shape toilet seat . Yet , this potty seat fits the seat in an awkward manner , causing pee to leak both on top and under the front of the toilet seat . Granted , I have little boys , so maybe this is n't so much of a problem with girls.We had MUCH better luck with the Mommy 's Helper Cushie Tushie potty seat ( the one with the ducks on it ) , which is , incidentally , much cheaper and easier to clean . The same unfortunate pee situation never happens with that seat .

27985.sentence: Though this is a nice sturdy potty seat and would probably be perfect for girls or larger boys , it did not work for me . My son has to hoist himself off and on the potty as he is not yet tall enough to rest his feet on the foot stool while using it . The pee guard is so large that I was seriously concerned about his `` equipment '' being damaged in the process of trying to stand up . I recommend the Arm and Hammer potty seat over this ( much cheaper too ) .

27986.sentence: I bought it based on so many great reviews . I wonder if I am the only one who was not able to attach it to the existing toilette seat . The description says `` adjusts easily and sits firmly in place '' ... well , it does not . It slides right out of the existing seat . SO I basically keep in there not attached at all and have to sit my child and remove him from there , otherwise the seat falls out .

27987.sentence: I 'm surprised by how well this is rated so I decided to add my two cents to the minority.The PROS : Fits snugly on any seat . We have round and elongated and it fits both no problem . Also , easy to clean . I also like the look of it ; simple and clean . I put one in the guest bathroom and I can leave it there when I have people over.The CONS : By the time you get the seat cover up , the pants down , the seat on and plop you kid on the toilet he 's already pee 'd hisself.The slashguard - after watching my sons try to get up from it on there own I quickly realized they might end up eunuchs . Even with the stool and me standing there it is still dangerous ; they have to be lifted . When they try to maneuver around it , the seat becomes dislodged from putting there weight on one side . I was horrified to hear that some boys actually pulled their skin open and needed stitches . I was even more appalled by some reviewers saying that the parents should have been more vigilant . With all the worry and guilt inherant in parenting thats just a mean thing to say ; and not trure . The whole point of potty training is to get your child to go on their own . They ca n't learn if you are hovering every time.I bought the built in toilet seat instead . There are two seats in one so both children and adults can use it .

27988.sentence: My daughter is on the thinner side and at 18 months struggles to get comfortable in this chair . She 's not able to sit on it without falling in . There 's no way that she could sit on this for any length of time because she 's having to hold her weight so she does n't fall in . In addition , the splash guard makes sitting on this super awkward . Another mother wrote about how her daughter needed stitches after cutting her genitals on the splash guard . I can totally see how this can happen . It 's not safe for your child to independently seat themselves without some help .

27989.sentence: I ordered this potty because after weeks of research , this was the only potty I could find that 's BPA free . When it came my daughter was excited to try it . Unfotunately she pinched her finger on the pull out center . She also voiced that her bottom hurt because it was too hard . She 's only 25 lbs and is a small girl but there is n't enough seat so it 's uncomfortable . She now refuses to sit on it . It 's going back .

27990.sentence: So we have been using this potty seat for several months now trying to get our daughter used to going on the potty . I bought this one because it had great reviews and was simple and easy to clean . But every time we put her on it , after only a few minutes she starts complaining that her feet hurt . What she means is that her feet are tingling and going to sleep . Then she does n't want to get off because her legs are numb and she gets scared . She is not a big girl but this seat is just too uncomfortable for her . Also , every time she gets up the insert sticks to her behind and will dump if there is anything in it . It also leaves her with a red ring around her butt . I am going to look for a cushioned potty chair next and hopefully we have more success .

27991.sentence: This is a basic potty with the pot that can be removed for easy cleaning so it 's easy to wash and clean but my poor kid stands up from sitting on this for mere minutes and has deep red marks on her legs and bottom , it 's uncomfortable ! I 'm going to order one with a cushy seat !

27992.sentence: looks cute but not functional for us.the depth of the plastic bowl is not deep.If the shit is coming out long and hard , it might push back up to the baby

27993.sentence: My son is 50th percentile for weight and height , so pretty average sized for a 2 year old . As lots of reviewers have mentioned , the height of this potty is great , the handholds on the side are a help , the splash guard is built in so there are no pinching problems there , and the back WOULD be nice except ... There is about an inch of space between the edge of the bowl and the back of the seat , so that when my son sits on it , the bowl shifts ever so slightly and his bum gets pinched in the back . The reviews have been so positive on the no-pinching thing that I was stunned by this . Even when he does not get pinched , he also ends up with seams cut into his little bum and back of legs , and as a result will not remain seated on this seat at all . Therefore I can not comment whether the pee goes into the bowl , because we never get that far.As far as disinfecting , I thought it would be really easy -- just pull the bowl out , dump it out , wipe , disinfect with clorox on occasion ... BUT several times poop has gotten under that back edge of the bowl , necessitating a cleaning of the rest of the seat as well , which is just a pain.Finally , the bowl is way too light and often sticks to my son 's legs and he stands up.I can not say , however , if there is anything better out there -- we have n't found the `` perfect '' potty yet , but if this is the best of the portable potties , I guess we 're going to have to go with the seat insert for our toilet , because this has turned out to be virtually worthless to us .

27994.sentence: I bought this for potty training my 2-year old daughter but she would n't use it . However , all kids are different in their potty training likes/dislikes , so I 'm only saying it did n't work for us . She preferred using the seats that go on top of your normal toilet seat or the type of potty chairs that had a lid to close . She liked the idea of closing the potty lid .

27995.sentence: I 'm surprised this potty got such rave reviews . My daughter is so uncomfortable with this potty trainer ! She 'll sit on it , but it 's so small . The splash guard is what really seems to make it uncomfortable for her . She 's accidental sat on it before and it hurt her . When she sits on it the splash guard makes her have to sit with her legs open , but as I mentioned the seat is pretty narrow so she ca n't really sit on it comfortably .

27996.sentence: I 'm really surprised at the 5 star reviews for this potty chair . If I had back all the time I have spent cleaning pee up off the floor I would be so happy . The splash guard is way too short , my son just pees right over the top of it . I do like the separate potty and it 's easy to clean but I still have to clean the whole chair because it simply does n't hold in the pee stream . Ugh . I 'm retiring it as soon as I get a different potty chair . MESSY .

27997.sentence: I bought this based on the overwhelmingly positive reviews . I was pretty disappointed over all . My daughter is tall for her age but not particularly chunky or chubby . In any case , every time she stood up from this potty chair she also brought a red mark from the circular opening on her bum . I thought it was a little narrow for her . Sometimes when she stood up , the white part actually came up with her . I personally did not think this was a great potty chair . I think this might be because I have a girl and not a boy , since there seems to be issue with other potty 's splash guards . In my case , my daughter did not find this seat comfortable and did not take to it at all . I later bought her that Fisher Price one with the face and that sings . It 's a little lower , but wider and the seat can not come up with her . She loves the songs , though it 's lower and it is actually wider , so even though she is tall , no problems . Again , do n't have a boy so ca n't speak to the splash guard issue , but really this potty is nothing out of this world for me . It 's collecting dust in my hallway closet right now .

27998.sentence: I bought this because of the excellent reviews , so I felt it necessary to add my review that is not as positive.My son is 3'3 '' & 30 pounds . ( he is almost 3 yr old ) He does fit on this potty , but it leaves horrible red marks in his inner thighs after only sitting on it a few minutes . It hurt his bottom so badly that he cried & said `` oh mommy my legs ! '' It 's not great to start potty training with a painful experience . He is now afraid of it.I do n't know if my son just has very sensitive skin or if it 's because he is too big for the chair , but I switched to a soft seat that goes on the big toilet & we are trying that now . I would n't recommend this potty for larger children .

27999.sentence: Great when my son was sitting down ... now that he stands ... junk . If not right on target , you 're going to have a mess every time . Think pee puddle under the chair ... and now imagine the smell . Totally gross , and getting rid of ASAP.Skip .

28000.sentence: This was the second potty we bought for our son , who is almost 3 . In one word - horrible . I had a lot of hope that , with all the excellent reviews , we 'd find success with this one . The basic issue is the splash guard , which really does n't work at all . Pee still goes everywhere . I 'd love to find one of the old-fashioned potties with the high cupped splash guard - but that 's nearly impossible . If I had known that this potty would be no better than others I 've tried , I would have saved my money .

28001.sentence: I have a Samsung Galaxy 4 , and definitely did not want to break it or crack the screen , this Case is just what I needed for the protection of my phone . Very durable and covers it up nicely . Definitely would recommend this product to anyone who has an S4 and wants to protect it .

28002.sentence: Fits the s4 like a glove ! Very easy to put on the phone . Perfect for protecting my purchase from life ! Highly recommend . Plus it looks great and is n't bulky like other Otter Box cases .

28003.sentence: Otter Box is the ultimate case for protecting your mobile phone . I like the commuter case because it has a slim look and still provides max protection .

28004.sentence: Amazing case for my Galaxy s4 . It looks durable , protective and do not make my cell to look bigger than it really is . It fits perfectly on the Galaxy s4 . Just buy it !

28005.sentence: This is for the Otterbox Commuter Series case for Samsung Galaxy S4 . The fit is perfect . Installation was a complete snap without any problems . It does n't add much weight to my cell phone ( which I was afraid it would do ) . While I have n't dropped it so I can not attest to its protectiveness , it is a great case . All of the holes leading to the charger , speaker , etc line up correctly . To charge , simple flip down the protective plastic which covers up the connection . It has built in covers for the volume control and off and on button . Both work great and I have not had any issues . The camera opening is also lined up perfectly and I have not had any issues with it . As an added plus , it came with a protective face shield that was extremely easy to apply . It does not get in the way of the sensors and works great.I have a white Galaxy S4 and wanted to retain the white without adding bulk or changing the color . This does the perfect job . The only issue I have with it is that I can not locate a holster that will work with it . I am a woman and do n't always carry my purse with me , so this is an issue .

28006.sentence: This case is perfect amount of rubber case and touch shell . light weight . protects charge and audio port . Good investment

28007.sentence: I have been using Outterbox Commuter cases for a few years now . This case fits the S4 perfectly . There are no lose fittings . All the ports and buttons are covered , port covers do stay in place when not in use . The two piece case is easy to take off , but more of a challenge to put back on . ( Gets easier with practice . ) I started out with the all black case , but when I saw this color , could n't resist getting it . It does add some bulk to the phone , but not much . It feels good in the hand as well . I have know worries when I drop my phone , of it getting damaged .

28008.sentence: Great fit , nice looking and protects my wifes samsung galaxy s 4 . We love otter box protectors they workas designed ! ! !

28009.sentence: I like everything about this case except the firmness of the rubber/silicone insert . It is rather stiff , which makes the power and volume buttons rather hard to press ( you sure wo n't press them accidentally ! ) .The color is nice , the design is nice , and the fit and feel is great . If they must use such a high durometer insert , they should make the material over the buttons a little thinner to make them easier to press .

28010.sentence: I was suprised at the color , it 's not even remotely close to the color pink I expected , it 's neon pink . The other surprise was how heavy it makes my light phone . I 've had other cases like this ( non Otterbox ) that were made with rubber and a plastic case but they were n't as heavy as this one.I think it will provide good protection , but I think I paid for the brand here , I do n't feel like this will provide any more protection than cheaper cases of the same type .

28011.sentence: I have been searching for a case for my Galaxy S4 that did not take away from the slimline look of my phone but yet offers great protection . This case is exactly what I have been searching for , my phone not only looks great but is completely protected !

28012.sentence: Gives your case good protection , looks great I had the commuter case for the S3 but this one looks and feels a lot better . I recommend This case not just for looks but for protection .

28013.sentence: As soon as it was received I tried it on my Samsung Galaxy S4 . It fits perfect on my phone and provides a strong protection against any kind of falls . I have always a good grip , will not slip from your hands as with other brands may occur . The power and volume buttons have not given me any kind of problems to use them with this case on my cellphine . I totally recommend it for a great protection .

28014.sentence: Just switched from an iPhone to the Samsung Galaxy S4 and this is the 4th case I 've bought . My favorite so far . Got the CM4 , Spigen Slim Armor , And Samsung protective case and this is by far the best and most protective ! Had the Commuter for the iPhone and did n't like them , but this fits perfectly for the GS4 and even included a screen protector that went on perfectly with the first try ! Does n't add much bulk and the color is great . Would absolutely recommend to anyone !

28015.sentence: I have researched this case and it is the best protection bar none . It fits well and slides easily in and out of your pocket .

28016.sentence: I bought this item to my girl friend , she love the color and its a robust structure and most important , the fashion look in its S4 .

28017.sentence: I thought the otterbox I had with my S3 was gone and then came you : - ) . I am more than pleased with this purchase to say the least . The construction and fit of the otterbox with my S4 is perfect . The look really compliments the phone . The screen protector is also of high quality and worked out great considering that I am no expert at applying screen protectors . Great Job !

28018.sentence: This is my 2nd Otterbox Commuter case . I have one for the S3 which is also excellent but a bit difficult to put on and take off . Very tight fit.This case has provided just as much protection as the S3 version and is easier to put on and take off so I would say it 's an improvement over the S3 version .

28019.sentence: My wife loves the style and protection this gives her Galaxy S4 Phone . I highly recommend this and other products from OtterBox .

28020.sentence: Love my otter box . I 'm not in the habit of dropping my phone , but it happens . I do n't want to end up with a cracked screen and then pay a lot of money to get it fixed . The otter box works . Just wish it can in some pretty designs .

28021.sentence: I purchased this in black for my S4 . I 'll give the case 5 stars for quality , fit , protection and function . The screen protector , not so much . My recommendation is YES , buy this case but buy another screen protector . I purchased the SPIGEN SGP Ultra Crystal for mine and I love it.The case fits perfectly and the phones buttons work great with the case installed . My wife has the Defender case for her Galaxy S3 . She is a klutz and requires the extra protection afforded by that beefier case . I chose the commuter because of it 's lower profile . The commuter also lacks the 'sticky ' silicone corner pads which seem to cling to the inside of pockets . The Commuter case seems to provide all the protection I 'll need with the added benefit of sliding in and out of my pocket with ease.I did make a modification to the case already . The USB connection on the phone is protected by a flap which seals very nicely when it 's closed . However , when the phone is plugged in ( as mine is most of the time ) that cover is unsightly to me and gets in the way . It 's a personal preference thing so I cut it off . It 's worth noting that I thought I could simply rip it off along the hinge by tearing the thinner material there . I could n't ... The plastic is very tough so no worries about the plastic flaps coming off on their own because of use . Removal required a sharp utility knife ( or similar ) . I left the cover over the headphone jack because I use it less frequently . It seals tightly and stay closed rather than flapping around and opening on it 's own.It has all the necessary holes in all the correct places so as not to impede the functions of the phone . It seems to provide all the protection I need while not being too obtrusive . The screen protector is the weak link here otherwise this is a 5-star product.UPDATE : It 's been a couple months since I first reviewed this case . In that time I 've dropped my phone onto pavement and other hard surfaces without damage . I am certain this case has saved the phone from destruction .

28022.sentence: This fits my phone perfectly . I saw some reviews talking about a loose fit and I was worried , but I never had an issues . I used the Defender on the iphones in the past and was sick of a heavy/clunky phone and this keeps my phone safe and sound and fits easily in my pocket . Will it protect my phone like a Defender from Otterbox ... no , but I do n't plan on dropping it out the window .

28023.sentence: It protects very well ! I would recommend it to others who are looking for an excellent case at a decent cost .

28024.sentence: This is n't my first Otterbox for a reason . They make a great case . Easy to take on and off . I have purchased the Commuter model for my older phones and they have protected my phone very well against many drops . I have purchased the Defender for my wife and kids . It too is a great case , but I prefer the Commuter . If you do n't need the ability to clip your phone to your belt , definitely go with the Commuter . It adds very little bulk to the phone , but still protects very well . The hard plastic shell allows it to slide easily in and out of pockets , unlike sticky silicon skinned cases . Great fit and protection for my new Galaxy S4 .

28025.sentence: The protector certainly does it 's job . I love that but the hybrid nature of it seems ... to not fit properly . You put the hard shell over the soft side and it squeezes so hard a bit of the soft rim comes a bit apart from the rest as you slide it in and out of your pocket . Otherwise , it falls and protects the phone in an A-1 manner .

28026.sentence: I have tried several phone cases for my Samsung Galaxy S4 , and prior to the OtterBox Commuter Series Case they have all been garbage at protecting my beloved gadget from my spastic meat hooks.I am a clumsy human being , and I need to protect my valuable possessions from my inherent clumsiness . The OtterBox Commuter Series Case has a soft , rubbery inner cover that acts as a shock-absorber and a rugged hard plastic outer cover to act like a medieval knight 's plate armor . The cutouts and button covers all line up well , and I 've noticed no sacrifice of functionality like I have with some of my previous cases . My phone is now well suited for the half-dozen daily drops onto concrete it has the pleasure to experience.My only complaint about this product , and the reason I did n't give it a 5 star review , is that the included screen protector is a nightmare to install . The instructions were inadequate at depicting all the necessary steps in applying the screen protector to one 's phone display , and the pull-tabs to remove the film from the front and back of the protective panel pulled away from the film ( instead of taking the film with them ) and thus required me to struggle at getting said films off the protector.Overall , this is a great case . Even if you just throw away the screen protector , this case is a great value to any klutz like me .

28027.sentence: I felt a little uncomfortable with my S4 , it is so small and thin . I was concerned about dropping it.Anyway , this case is so cool . It 's easy to hold the phone , and it does n't add any appreciable weight or bulk.I did look at the Samsung case too . The flap over the front was of interest , but in the end it did n't seem as usable.Oh , and I did not install the so called screen protector . The phone has gorilla glass , why would you want to muck with it ? Screen protectors always diminish display quality , and I question that they will protect your phone screen when you drop it . Of course , installing it is your options.The case is great .

28028.sentence: I purchased this case for my wifes Galaxy S4 . I had looked at the Otterbox website and according to there website they had not released these colores yet in Silver and Pink . I did not want the black nor the white with gray for her so I decided to see if by chance anyone had any of the other colors . To my surprise they did . I contacted the company first to see if they actually had it in stock and not backorderd . They replied quickly as in stock . I placed the order and received it with in three days . I am very pleased with the customer service and there quick shipping.The otterbox itself is really nice . My wife seems to really like it . I have the S3 with an otterbox as well and there are a couple of things that I noticed right away . First , was the volume and power pushers . On this new model they are perfect , not hard like on the S3 but not to soft either . I was really pleased about that but the one thing that does have me a little worried is that on the S3 the outer hard plastic goes around the pushers just leaving the corners exposed with the rubber and on the S4 the hard plastic ends underneath the volume and power pushers , leaving more of an area with just the rubber . To me atleast , it just seems like the S3 has better protection with the outer hard plastic going all the way up . I 'm not sure if it was made this way so they can make the pushers softer or for better grip but in any case that is what I noticed and thought I should mention it . Besides that , the rest of the case is wonderful . It 's not to bulky and has a good feel to it . I would trust this case over most others . I am just wainting for them to realease the other colors like the silver and blue for me to purchase as I just got an S4 for myself .

28029.sentence: I purchased my Otterbox off of Ebay for about $ 5 less ( I know how Ebay can be but yes it 's a real Otterbox , from a USA seller . ) Anyways , so that 's just to let you know that I will not be rating the seller of this product , or shipping , JUST the case itself.I purchased the `` Marine '' color . By the stock Otterbox photos of the case ( which both this Amazon listing and the Ebay listing use ) I fully expected grey hard case and black soft case . However , for others purchasing the Marine color , the inner soft case is actually a very dark blue , a color which none of the stock photos seem to show well . So I took my own photo to give a more realistic idea of the colors there . It was n't an issue with me , so I kept it.The screen protector that came with the case works very well . I have no dust or bubbles showing , and it fits perfectly . However , unfortunately the top corners were bent inside the Otterbox packaging . This was NOT a result of getting bumped around in shipping - it was the way the manufacturer had stuffed it into the box . So those two corners have never and will never stick properly to the phone ... I will probably have to replace it much sooner than normally for that reason.The case itself fits very well . It 's not too bulky and it 's not so thin that I still feel nervous about carrying my phone . The edges of the case extend above the screen so that if you flip it screen side down , the screen will never ever touch the surface . All the buttons still work perfectly , the phone does n't get overheated.BONUS : I can tell you that if you are wanting a wireless charger , they DO work through the Commuter case .

28030.sentence: I bought this as a gift and my friend is happy with it . Its not too bulky and protects the phone well . It 's easy to install .

28031.sentence: The commuter series does not make your phone look too bulky . Just wish I had ordered a different color because the lighter colors may get dirty from the handling .

28032.sentence: Its been 3 weeks I was using and it is very comfortable cover . It fits the phone perfectly . Though the screen protector gets bubbles in one week . 100 % I recomment it . but it is worth .

28033.sentence: This was the first OtterBox case that I have ever tried for mySamsung Galaxy S4and I can truly say that I am impressed . TheOtterBox Commuter Series Case for Samsung Galaxy S4has a snug fit that was a little difficult to get on at first . But once it was installed , it fit perfectly . The quality and feel of the case is very sound . It may be a little 'slick ' feeling on the back for some , but I really do n't like full rubberized/tacky cases . i feel comfortable holding it and do n't believe it will slip out of my hands or from between my shoulder and ear when not using my bluetooth headset.I had never used an OtterBox branded product before because I thought they looked too bulky for my tastes . But with my rugged handling of my smartphone during business travel , I needed something that could help protect it . And I was pleasantly surprised that the OtterBox did not make the phone too bulky to keep in my pants or jacket pocket . Nor was the case cut such that I could n't use it with my travel charger ( unlike 2 other cases i previously purchased ) .In all , this is a great investment to protect your smartphone by balancing the bulk needed for protection and the style needed for a serious businessperson .

28034.sentence: I could not find a protector of this quality locally , so I 'm glad I found it on Amazon . It fits the S4 perfectly .

28035.sentence: I have always used the OtterBox Defender series on my phones so I decided to try the Commuter for my wife 's S4 . She likes it and it fits well .

28036.sentence: I 've had several otterbox cases for other phones and they 've been amazing . They really have protected my phone from clumsy people ( like myself ! ) . And this one i got in the & # 34 ; Wild Orchid & # 34 ; color which is a very light gray outer case and the pink inner case is brighter in person . Very pretty . I 've gotten several compliments on it . I love it !

28037.sentence: I love this case ! It looks great on my phone , I bought it in raspberry , and feels great ! It adds a little size to the phone , which is great for me because the phone is so slim , and this is the perfect solution . I feel like this case offers the best protection of the cases available for this phone . I have tried three different cases , including this one , and while I have n't returned all of them , this is my favorite . I have n't dropped my phone , yet . However , I feel that if I do drop it , this case will be my savior . The hard outer case is sturdy and holds the rubberized case snug to the phone and comes up around the edges . It is fairly easy to put on and I found it easier to keep the 2 pieces together while putting it on the phone , otherwise , I found it to be a little bit of a struggle . I really do n't feel that anyone choosing this case will be disappointed , I 'm pretty picky and was happy to find a case I liked so quickly . My only suggestion is that I think they should make it in more colors .

28038.sentence: Could n't say anything negative- it 's an Otterbox- my rave review is for Amazon providing us with quality for less cost . It 's ridiculous to pay the retail price . Thank heaven for Amazon !

28039.sentence: Fits like a glove . Have n't actually dropped the phone to test out the durability of the case . Screen protector is fits perfect . Only negative is that dust gets trapped under the rubber section , not a big deal tho .

28040.sentence: I love the case I just did n't like the color . but it is a very strong item for everyday use

28041.sentence: Great fit as always from Otterbox and it comes with a really high quality screen protector . I have dropped my phone at least 5 times so far and it has n't been damaged yet ... ..

28042.sentence: Absolutely love this case . with every new phone I have to have an otterbox case so this was a no brainer . I love the color . I was a little scared the grey part would look blue in person , but it does n't at all . It 's a beautiful color and most importantly protects my phone . Easy to put on and easy to take off

28043.sentence: I can not say enough good things about OtterBox , especially when this case is amazing and looks amazing ! The colors do n't get dirty and it fits comfortably in my armbands for when I work out ! Worth the purchase !

28044.sentence: That warm and fuzzy feeling of safety and protection is great . Especially when you know you 'll eventually fall prey to butter fingers and drop that phone that cost more than a nice laptop . It 's not the prettiest case out there ( I 'd love to be able to admire the brushed aluminum edge on my SGS4 ) , but there are Otterbox loyalists who will debate that . I like that it slides into and out of my pocket easily ( or as easily a quasi-phablet can ) . I have n't & # 34 ; test dropped & # 34 ; it , nor do I think I will . But I sure do feel better knowing that when ( not if ) I do , my phone stands a better chance of coming out unscathed than if it were not wrapped in its two sleek layers of protection . Two grumbles : the rubbery part does seem to collect dust and it can be annoying when you take the case off -- but that 's not an everyday event . Also the two & # 34 ; port covers & # 34 ; for the MicroUSB port and the headphone jack can get in the way of a quick installation or removal of the case , and they 're not the easiest to peel down to insert the cable you want to . These are not deal-breakers though . And of course you 'll get a much better deal on a genuine Otterbox via Amazon than you would at your wireless carrier 's store or any brick-and-mortar store for that matter . Order your case a little bit ahead of when you 're getting your new phone and you 'll be protected from day one !

28045.sentence: Otterbox delivers as always.Case is strong , I like the feel , the back slides into pants easily but the front can keep it from slipping if put face down on a smooth surface.Screen protector included works well , good feel , has a bit of a gloss when screen is off or in bright sunlight , but works as I 'd want.Good buy .

28046.sentence: Great cover and is what was described when purchased . Thank you for a great product . We are extremely happy and satisfied .

28047.sentence: Otterbox is always a top case maker . I think they are actually the # 1 case maker in the US , and for a good reason .

28048.sentence: Otterbox cases are a little bulky but I like the extra protection . The commuter is the best for pants pockets . Mostly smooth plastic with a little bit of rubber on the corners means it slides in and out with ease . I still have one on my iphone 4 for over 2 years but it did need some glue in the corners . This one for the S4 in designed better with no edges to catch in your pocket . My wife has the defender and it 's not really that much larger than the commuter and has much more screen protection but lots of sticky rubber .

28049.sentence: I am so in love with the color not to mention i have a big problem with dropping my electronics and this does help me . I no longer have to be worried about cracked screens or malfunctioning phone

28050.sentence: I have an OtterBox 77-27768 Defender Series Case and Holster for Samsung Galaxy S4 and i bought this one for my girlfriend . Great material and fits well .

28051.sentence: This is an amazing product , really well manufactured and fits my cellphone like a glove ! Is the big boss in cases ! 100 % recommended

28052.sentence: i had a galaxy S2 that i loved.. then dropped it once from my lap as i was exiting my car . The screen was destroyed and it cost me over $ 200 to repair . Once i got my S4 , i got this case the same day . And it has been AWESOME . I 've dropped my phone at least a dozen times and there has been not even a hint of a problem with it . Sure , it makes the phone a little bulkier , so you do n't have the sleekness of the uber thin S4 . But do you want a phone to last you or not ? So if you fear dropping it , GET THIS CASE ! the defender is more & # 34 ; child proof & # 34 ; sturdy , but this commuter case is plenty good if you do n't have kids grabbing your phone and tossing out across the room .

28053.sentence: This product was ordered for a friend . She absolutely loves the product . She changed from the iPhone to the Samsung and wanted the outer box because the one she had for the iPhone worked so well .

28054.sentence: Had an old Epic 4g , which surprisingly took a beating , and did not even use a case . Upgraded to Verizon Galaxy S4 , and knew it definitely needed a case . I work in an office , and do n't see myself using it in hardcore situations , so I chose the Commuter case . Fit was pretty nice , though it should be noted that it is a little loose with pulling over the top third sides of the phone ; this it where the buttons are , and only silicone protected . However , the phone has not slipped out . Alignment over all the ports and buttons are great . Obviously , while it does n't retain the slimness of the S4 , it is comfortable enough to put in your jeans or pants . Definitely not curved in the back as the first image on the page here appears . Comfortable in my hands . Of note , decided to go with a 3rd party screen protectorTech Armor Samsung Galaxy S4 SIV Premium High Definition ( HD ) Clear Screen Protectors with Lifetime Replacement Warranty [ 3-Pack ] - Retail Packagingas previous reviews mention that the Otterbox screen protector was subpar , and have not had issues with it . Gestures ( including palm swipe ) work fine . Have not had a drop situation yet , but it at least gives me the perception that it will protect better than other cases . If you have or are willing to drop money for a second case for more upscale situations , considerSamsung Galaxy S4 Tough Cases - Olo by Case-Mate Black/BlackorSPIGEN SGP Samsung Galaxy S4 Case Protective [ Neo Hybrid ] [ Infinity White ] Slim Fit Dual Protection Cover for Galaxy S IV Galaxy SIV i9500 .

28055.sentence: This is a well-built case that provides about the best protection I have seen for after market cases . The price is reasonable and it comes in multiple colors . So why only four stars ? NO BELT CLIP ! For anyone carrying this phone in a pocket or purse , no problem . But for carrying the phone on an active job , I NEED a belt clip . I tried to solve this by buying a BoxWave case and trying to slip the OtterBox into the belt clip case of that unit , but the clips on the side break off after little use due to the thickness of the OtterBox case . If OtterBox would make a model with a belt clip ( if they do I have not found it ) then this case would win the five stars .

28056.sentence: I would n't recommend this to anyone that wants a small , sleek case . That said , if you do n't mind your phone being bulky due to the case then this is a great product . I really like mine and it definitely protects the phone well .

28057.sentence: This commuter case is a vast improvement over the s3 commuter case . Otterbox has done well to improve their cases . The buttons fit flush now and the plug covers have extra silicone on them to hold them in place . This one has n't lost it 's shape and holds up very well .

28058.sentence: Everything fit together well . The screen protector went on without any problems ( I put Tech Armor on another phone and had many problems ) . Nice to see OtterBox pays attention to detail . Was told the product had a lifetime guarantee , but that is wrong . Word of advice , when putting on the screen protector - make sure your screen is clean , I used a LCD spray cleaner . Also when applying the screen protector make sure it is aligned to the phone edges . It helps when pulling off the # 1 layer to do it slowly and hold down the layer touching the screen .

28059.sentence: The Otterbox Commuter for the Galaxy S3 almost made me lose faith with Otterbox Products . The Iphone 5 Commuter is n't as bad as the S3 but was n't up to par.The new Galaxy S4 case does everything that an Otterbox should . It fits precisely , protects the phone , is easy to install , offers good grip while being easy to slide in and out of the pocket , and looks good on the phone . The rubber also does n't attract lint like the older Otterbox cases.Here is my Commuter rating scale from previous phones that I have owned : Samsung Captivate-GoodIphone 4-ExcellentGalaxy S2- ExcellentHTC One X- FairGalaxy S3-PoorIphone 5- FairGalaxy S4- Excellent

28060.sentence: I received my Galaxy S4 , Otterbox Commuter case , and iBOLT xProdock car-dock 2 days before running off on a 3-week , 4000 mile road trip to the Southwest for hiking , camping , and photography . The case worked as expected ( I 've been using Otterbox cases for years ) except for one thing I never thought about until I used it with my Galaxy S4..See con's.Pro 's : * Durable . I dropped my phone several times during my trip on concrete , gravel , sand , and tile flooring . The case did its job . It has a few battle scars on the case but hardly noticeable since I got my case black-on-black . * The back-side of the case is a little thicker than it the Otterbox commuter I had with my previous Motorola Atrix phone . While boiling water at our campsite one night the pot bubbled over and ran down the tabletop right over to my phone . When I got there my phone was literally sitting in a pile of very hot water . The thickness of the case protected it from any of the standing water making its way to my actual phone . A quick wipe with a paper towel and all was good . *Note , its not waterproof nor is the case intended to be . *Usability of buttons . This is one place I put Otterbox above all other cases I have owned . All ports are still easily accessible and buttons are easy to press , even with gloves on . The rubber port cover over the USB charging port is extra-nice for keeping debris out , yet very easy to open for charging.Con 's : *Holds in heat . While plugged into my car-dock and exposed to full sun my phone became extremely hot , even with the A/C on . I know that sounds obvious but the full-sun exposure never caused a problem with the past 3 phones I used in this manner . I constantly received the pop-up message on my phone saying `` Charging Paused , battery too hot . '' It never lead to any major problems but is annoying when I get that message when its only 75 degree 's outside . I definitively ca n't say its the phone or the case 's fault , but the logic of having a device encased in a thick black case makes sense that it will absorb and retain heat .

28061.sentence: I was worried this case would be too bulky , but its the perfect level of protection without being too thick . It still fits in my dashboard mount without issue.Its very well protected , and even came with a quality screen protector that somehow feels smoother than the glass itself.I havent dropped it to test its durability yet , but im not worried about my brand new phone breaking at all anymore . Its definitely a confidence inspiring case to say the least

28062.sentence: I was originally going to get the & # 34 ; marine & # 34 ; colored case , but this one was cheaper . I really like the black mist/black case combo . This is built differently than the GS3 case , with less exposed rubber on the corners and a more unified feel . The GS3 case came in 2 distinct pieces , but I had a hard time telling this was 2 pieces until I really looked . Have n't used the screen protector yet , so I 'm not sure how well that works .

28063.sentence: I bought this for my Mom 's brand new Galaxy S4 . It looks great ( make sure you look at all pics , though ... there is a lot of & # 34 ; orchid & # 34 ; on the front rim ) , snaps on the phone like it always belonged there , and offers moderate protection from bumps and minor drops . The price on Amazon is amazing , considering the Sprint Store wanted to sell her the same case for $ 49.99 .

28064.sentence: I 'm really not an otterbox fan , but this is a nice case . It does n't bulk the phone up to much . It maintains nice , snug natural feel and is truly rugged . I got this for my wifes phone . If otterbox made one for my Galaxy mega with a holster , I would buy it without any second thoughts .

28065.sentence: bought this by mistake but I LOVE the color and the feel too bad I had a s3 instead of a s4 ! worth the buy ... very stylish

28066.sentence: My son absolutely loves this case . He stopped putting cases on his phone because he wanted to show off the white phone , this solved both problems , now he can show it off as well as protect it at the same time .

28067.sentence: Well what can ya say ? It 's Otterbox - one of the best protective cases you can get for your phone . The commuter is for the person on the go who is not so clumsy but , the occasional drop might happen . If you are rougher on your phone than most - get the otterbox defender - it has a built in screen protector also.If you do buy this one - do n't use the cheap stick on screen protector - get yourself a moshi washable re-usable protector ! Wish I knew about them sooner ! And your welcome !

28068.sentence: Received it fast and loved it ! I did not use the screen protector that came with it based on the reviews I read that said it was n't great so I ordered a TECH ARMOR screen protector along with the case . Very durable and does n't add too much bulk like the other otter box cases . Definitely worth it , order it now !

28069.sentence: Great case for the S4.Looks good and looks like it will do a decent job of protecting the phone.It is still comfortable to hold the phone with the case on it and the phone slides in and out of pockets with no problems.I am not using the included screen protector.Instead , I 'm using ailoome Samsung Galaxy S4 ( HD Clear ) ScreenMate Real Tempered Glass 9H Hardness Premium Screen Protector with Oleophobic Coating.There is a review of the iloome screen protector on you tube by Erica Griffin that can be found here : [ ... ] That demonstration of what a tempered glass screen protector can do for you is one of the neatest things I 've seen . Go on , hit your screen with a HAMMER after installing the iloome tempered glass screen protector . That is just too cool.As for the Otterbox , no complaints . Looks great , goes on easy , and it offers substantial protection for the body of the phone .

28070.sentence: Best phone protection ever . Anyone who has a mobile phone of value should most definitely buy otterbox for protection . I will never go without it .

28071.sentence: Bought this for the Hubby 's phone . He 's notoriously rough on phones and I wanted to protect our investment . This is a great case because it is simple , not overly designer-ish and is sturdy enough . No problem with the fit and was easy to put on .

28072.sentence: This case fits perfectly . All of the other cases that I have tryied are to big . Thin case and protection for my phone .

28073.sentence: Purchased it to replace a slip fit hard case that cracked the first time it was dropped . Like the Otter Commuter design . Comes in two pieces , pink is softer plastic , to obsorb the bangs to the corners & sides . Grey is harder plastic that fits nicely over the pink .

28074.sentence: When my wife and I got the new S-4 I went with the standard Defender Series but she dose n't wear a belt that often and with the redsign of the the S-4 over the S-3 her old one one would fit I found this one that matched ner colorful manner . The only down side is it dose n't protect as good as the Defened series so do n't expect it too . ( Already had to replace the phone and it only fell off the bed onto a carpeted floor my phone was was with it npo dames to mine her screen was brokne in two places ) . It is fair protection for the phone .

28075.sentence: the case is very good and protects the phone very well . i dropped it many times and felt assured that the phone is fine and it has been thus far . thanks it very nice case and takes of easily to .

28076.sentence: I 've abused my phone and this case has kept my phone by going kaputs on me . I really love the case . It fits the phone to the t. It does it job . I 'm going to buy another one because I 'm tired of the color that I got ... might go for an all white one this time .

28077.sentence: I 've been using the TPU covers on my wife 's iPhone and my prior phone , a HTC EVO - these wrap around the front so you have some protection if you drop the phone . The ones I 've used areDiztronic Matte Back Black TPU Case for Sprint HTC Evo 4G LTE ( 2012 4G LTE Model Only ) - Retail PackagingandDiztronic Matte Back Black Flexible TPU Case for Apple iPhone 5 / 5S - Retail PackagingNeither phone has been damaged despite numerous drops.The Otterbox Commuter adds an extra layer of hard plastic . While this should make it more robust , it does make it a bit bulkier . Still , if you are more concerned about damage than the size , this is a decent way to go , but to repeat , we have n't had any damage to our phones while using the thinner TPU only cases I mentioned above .

28078.sentence: The OtterBox case for my new Galaxy S4 phone is by far the best cell phone case I 've ever had . It is definitely worth every penny I paid for it . Soft and easy to grip on the outside , it has a heavy inner shell that really protects my phone . It also has a screen protector that is second to none.The port for charging the battery has a protective cover too .

28079.sentence: There are many reviews telling how well the case is so I am just going to talk about the few questions/concerns I had with this case in case anyone else may want to know as well.Wireless charging : I installed this wireless charging receiver : B00D2V9XFCand tested it with this charging pad : B00DQDE1K8I linked the two products as I would imagine ( I have n't had a whole lot of experience with wireless charging ) that the results you get depend on the charger and receiver you picked . Anyway , It worked just fine in the otterbox case.SPIGEN glass screen protectors : I purchased the .23 mm version of the glass . After applying it the Otterbox case was significantly harder to snap together . I stopped trying to force it for fear of damaging something . I think the .15 mm version of the glass might work with this otterbox case but I ca n't say for sure.Other thoughts on quality : I have had Otterbox Defender cases in the past . With the S4 case I feel as though they used a cheaper material to make the rubber shell that goes around the plastic one . It still protects and this is just a personal observation/opinion.The reason I docked one star is because of the plastic film that is built in to protect the screen . On any of the otterbox cases I have owned this screen is n't that great as I feel it gives the screen of my phone a filmy look ( I hope this makes sense . ) I have heard others just remove it and substitute there own but I have never personally done this and I do have to admit that you can get used too it . I still dock the star though because in this case where the phone has an HD screen I feel it matters.Bottom line : I do like this case but sadly am returning it since I applied that glass screen protector . I really do feel like I am giving my phone some serious protection as it takes me forever and some sore fingers to get that dang plastic shell apart even when the phone is n't in it .

28080.sentence: I have tried numerous cases on my other phones and nothing compares to the OtterBox . I had The Commuter on my HTC phone and it worked great . Now I have a new phone and have gotten the Defender for both mine and my husband 's phone . It adds a little bulk and if you like the slim Galaxy then this is not for you . If you want protection and good grip this is the one for you . I like that there is a plastic screen protector in addition to the snap on clip part for added protection . I seem to always be dropping my phones so I need good protection and this is the one for me . I totally love it . It fits tight so do n't plan on changing out a battey unless you do n't mind losing your nails lol ... but I like the fact that my phone is protected . I am one to keep my phones for 2 years so I want to keep it nice .

28081.sentence: My husband is very rough on his phones due to his job , and we used to have to make at least one or two insurance claims during the duration of our contracts in order to replace them , or have a cracked screen repaired , etc . We always had spare phones on hand for this purpose , just in case . It was a pain , but we learned to adapt - until the most amazing thing that we have discovered -how AWESOME Otterboxes are.He has dropped his S4 off of a roof in this case , and it miraculously survived . I have no idea how , but only the case was scuffed . If that 's not a testimony , I do n't know what is . My Otterbox is on the way as we speak - I bought a standard flip folio case since my phone is relatively safe during the day ( from my bedside table , to my cell pocket in my purse , to my work desk , and back in the purse and home ) , but I still want that extra level of protection . Some people argue it 's expensive , but when you consider that it 's less than the cost of our deductible to replace his S4 that fell off of the roof - it 's definitely worth it !

28082.sentence: I 've always been impressed with OtterBox quality and protection - owning six cases for various devices made by them , and this OtterBox Defender case with holster for the Samsung Galaxy S4 is no different .
